## LoRA

- [LoRA Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.09685) - "LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models" (Hu et al., 2021)
- [PEFT on GitHub](https://github.com/huggingface/peft) - Hugging Face's Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning library, supporting LoRA, QLoRA, and other adapters

## QLoRA

- [QLoRA Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2305.14314) - "QLoRA: Efficient Finetuning of Quantized LLMs" (Dettmers et al., 2023)
- [bitsandbytes on GitHub](https://github.com/bitsandbytes-foundation/bitsandbytes) - Library providing 4-bit and 8-bit quantization support used by QLoRA

## Fine-Tuning Frameworks

- [TRL (Transformer Reinforcement Learning)](https://github.com/huggingface/trl) - Hugging Face's training library, including the SFTTrainer used in this module
- [Unsloth on GitHub](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth) - Fast and memory-efficient QLoRA/LoRA training with optimized CUDA kernels

## Weights & Biases

- [Weights & Biases](https://wandb.ai) - ML experiment tracking and visualization platform used to monitor training runs
- [W&B Quickstart](https://docs.wandb.ai/quickstart) - Getting started guide for logging metrics and comparing runs
- [W&B Hugging Face Integration](https://docs.wandb.ai/guides/integrations/huggingface) - Automatic integration with Hugging Face Trainer for zero-config logging

## Hugging Face

- [Hugging Face Hub](https://huggingface.co) - Central repository for sharing models, datasets, and demos
- [Datasets Documentation](https://huggingface.co/docs/datasets) - Library for loading, processing, and publishing datasets
- [Model Cards Guide](https://huggingface.co/docs/hub/model-cards) - Best practices for writing model cards, including recommended sections and metadata

## Quantization and Local Deployment

- [llama.cpp on GitHub](https://github.com/ggml-org/llama.cpp) - C/C++ library for GGUF quantization (`llama-quantize`) and local inference
- [LM Studio](https://lmstudio.ai/) - Desktop GUI for discovering, downloading, and chatting with quantized models from Hugging Face
